title: get_admin_dashboard
description: Test the GET /admin endpoint to verify that the admin dashboard data is retrieved successfully with a 200 status code and contains accurate real-time statistics and overview.

title: get_all_products
description: Test the GET /admin/products endpoint to ensure all products are retrieved successfully with a 200 status code and the response contains the complete list of products.

title: create_new_product
description: Test the POST /admin/products endpoint to create a new product with valid data and verify that the product is created successfully with a 201 status code and the product details are correctly saved.

title: get_product_by_id
description: Test the GET /admin/products/{id} endpoint to retrieve a product by its ID and verify the response returns the correct product details with a 200 status code.

title: update_product
description: Test the PUT /admin/products/{id} endpoint to update an existing product's details and verify the product is updated successfully with a 200 status code and changes are reflected.

title: delete_product
description: Test the DELETE /admin/products/{id} endpoint to delete a product by its ID and verify the product is deleted successfully with a 200 status code and no longer appears in product listings.

title: get_all_orders
description: Test the GET /admin/orders endpoint to retrieve all orders successfully with a 200 status code and verify the response contains the complete list of orders.

title: create_new_order
description: Test the POST /admin/orders endpoint to create a new order and verify the order is created successfully with a 201 status code and order details are correctly saved.

title: get_order_by_id
description: Test the GET /admin/orders/{id} endpoint to retrieve an order by its ID and verify the response returns the correct order details with a 200 status code.

title: update_order_status
description: Test the PUT /admin/orders/{id} endpoint to update the status of an existing order and verify the order status is updated successfully with a 200 status code and changes are reflected.
